name: Cloud+Mobile+Social
description: A talented group of Angels & Experts
overview:
Cloud-Mobile-Social is the exclusive brand of a talented group of Angels & Experts with a passion for building disruptive ventures. • We are specialists in idea validation/valuation, business strategy, funding, mobile and social app development, launch, traction, scale and exit.

“Cloud” (Improve Life) - Access, Security, Hadoop, Big data, Distributed processing “Mobile” (Extend Technology) – In Hand, Comm, Video, App’s, Transactions, Ads, Analytics “Social” (Expand Social Action) – Connections, App’s, Media, Ads, Commerce, Analytics, Life, Roadmap, what’s next?

 We look for: • Compelling business proposition • Team that will execute • Fire-breather markets • Traction • Scale • High exit multiples

Contact us at 1cloudmobilesocial@gmail.com
